column2: Invite an emissary to your court to aid with diplomatic affairs.
Invite a soldier to your court, to help command and train your armies.
Invite a spy to your court, to help run your spy network.
Invite a promising nobleman to your court, to aid with matters of administration.
Invite a young maiden to your court.
Get your minions to fetch you a female slave to satisfy your needs.
Get your minions to fetch you a slave to satisfy your needs.
